content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Station at (-14.0, -15.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) containing 188 coal

### Iron Mining Station at (-14.0, 23.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 710 iron ore

### Iron Smelting Line at (-10.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (-11.0, 20.0)
- Stone furnace at (-9.0, 20.0)

### Copper Processing Line at (22.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) mining copper ore
- Input chest at (20.5, 21.5) containing 53 copper ore
- Middle storage chest at (22.5, 21.5) containing 409 copper ore
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
- Output chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing 53 copper plates
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving items from furnace to output chest

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Before placing any entity, check if the target position and surrounding tiles required by the entity dimensions are free
- The agent tried to place a burner inserter at (23.5, 20.5) but failed because another entity was already there
- Consider scanning the area or checking entity collision boxes before placement

### Entity Connection Issues
- When connecting entities with inserters, ensure the pickup and drop positions align properly with the source and target entities
- Verify inserter rotation and position allows it to reach both the source and destination inventories
- Make sure inserters are placed at correct distances from both source and target entities to function properly

### Resource Management
- Multiple entities are showing "out of fuel" warnings
- Implement regular fuel checking and refueling routines for burner devices
- Consider setting up automated fuel delivery systems for mining drills and inserters
